message: Let's be fair and divide it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
I understand you want to be fair, but the value of the money decreases rapidly for me. Let's be reasonable and split it 65-35.
I see you're eager to get a bigger share, but I'm not willing to give up that much. How about we meet in the middle?
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing a huge chunk of value with every round. You said 'fair' before, but 60-40 in my favor is more than fair considering the circumstances.
I see you're getting desperate, but I'm not going to give in that easily. My offer is still more generous than yours was in the first round.
Alice, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. 55-45 is the best you'll get from me.  The clock is ticking and we both lose if this drags on.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll take what you can get at this point. My offer is still better than nothing, which is what you'll get if we don't agree soon.
